quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler

quotes.text: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.text: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: Dreams don't work unless you do.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.text: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
